duties_responsibilities.duty: Be the bridge between external vendors and internal leads to deliver user-focused solutions.
Strengthen and grow existing partnerships and identify opportunities to build relationships with new vendors.
Establish technical direction for outsourcing vendors and communicate cross-discipline with various departments to understand goals and requirements of features.
Ensure feature request requirements are clear, consistent, and achievable and communicate feedback to the outsource partner.
Represent the technical discipline at a senior level, ensuring appropriate staffing and prioritizing the right things.
Continuously look for opportunities to improve technical advancements and adopt new best practices.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Software Engineering, Computer Science, or related field (Master's preferred)
